Description:
Union Square House is expanding its wings and has evolved as a real estate solutions company with a turnover of one billion dollars per year. Since its incorporation in UAE from year 2009, the company has been a pioneer for all real estate solutions. We are the preferred partners and an award-winning property brokerage firm from leading developers like DAMAC, EMAAR, NAKHEEL, MERAAS, DUBAI PROPERTIES, LAND DEPARTMENT, SOBHA etc., for consecutive ten years. Our senior management and experienced agents have been in the industry for over 15 years having worked with some of the most renowned property companies in UAE.  We treat every employee as a part of the family and offer a multicultural environment to thrive in. We strongly believe that Hard Work Pays Off, so we are look at hiring talent based on quality and fit for the company culture we have created.We are looking for passionate Russian, Hindi, German and French speakers Real Estate Sales Professional to join our team.
